title: UI and customization
description: Changing parameters is straightforward and easy. You can have a tailor-made design and a smooth appearance within seconds. It is possible, among others, to adjust integrated player controls, icons, background color, add a poster, change the cursor etc. Of course, you can also disable all built-in styles. In this manual, we will go through customizable elements so that  H5Live Player UI will suit all your needs.
